content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with a potential tenant named Emilia Müller.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, did you come close to an agreement? If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: We did not come close to an agreement. The tenant's final offer was 800 Euro per month, while I was asking for 1200 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I am not satisfied with the outcome, so I would rate it as a 1.
name: Peter Schmidt
